job_description: • C++ EngineerlocationsCollege Park, MDposted onPosted 21 Days AgoR0232966 Front End Software Developer, SeniorlocationsAnnapolis Junction, MDposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR0230668 Full Stack Software Engineer, SeniorlocationsAnnapolis Junction, MDposted onPosted 19 Days AgoR0232772 Full Stack Software Engineer, SeniorlocationsAnnapolis Junction, MDposted onPosted 14 Days AgoR0233401 Full Stack Software Engineer, SeniorlocationsAnnapolis Junction, MDposted onPosted 14 Days AgoR0233399 Full Stack Software Engineer, SeniorlocationsAnnapolis Junction, MDposted onPosted 14 Days AgoR0233402 Full Stack Software Engineer, LeadlocationsAnnapolis Junction, MDposted onPosted 8 Days AgoR0233404 Remote Sensing Software Engineering ManagerlocationsDayton, OHposted onPosted 13 Days AgoR0233476 Full Stack Software Engineer, SeniorlocationsFayetteville, NCposted onPosted 23 Days AgoR0232552 Software Reverse Engineer, SeniorlocationsFort Meade, MDposted onPosted 26 Days AgoR0231423.

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• In this role, you will play a key part in defining software requirements, designing embedded solutions, and verifying system performance, ensuring our maintenance systems meet the evolving needs of modern aircraft.
• The ideal candidate will bring hands‑on experience with system‑level testing, REST APIs, structured data formats, and embedded or IoT platforms to ensure the reliability, performance, and compliance of technologies deployed across mission‑critical environments worldwide.
• You’ll bridge engineering and IT to ensure complex aerospace development ecosystems perform at scale, meet rigorous standards, and align with regulatory and export‑controlled requirements.
• This position is ideal for engineers experienced in modern software development methodologies, debugging, and performance optimization, who thrive in highly technical, cross‑functional environments.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements You will report directly to our Senior Engineering Manager and you will work out of our Phoenix, AZ location on a Hybrid work schedule.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
